akn:section.akn:heading: Funds for specific and authorized projects merged with and accounted for under regular annual approp

akn:content.akn:p: § 701f–2. Funds for specific and authorized projects merged with and accounted for under regular annual appropriation Funds on and after May 17, 1950, appropriated for a specific and heretofore authorized project for a river, harbor, or flood-control works shall be merged with and be accounted for under the regular annual appropriation title applicable to such item. (May 17, 1950, ch. 188, title II, § 207, 64 Stat. 182.)
